House Bill/Resolution NO. HB07974
FULL TITLE : AN ACT AMENDING REPUBLIC ACT NO. 10708, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE "TAX INCENTIVES MANAGEMENT AND TRANSPARENCY ACT", EXPANDING ITS COVERAGE TO ENHANCE FISCAL TRANSPARENCY AND ACCOUNTABILITY, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Aims to include the tax incentives data of following sectors within the coverage of Tax incentives Management and Transparency Act (TIMTA): cooperatives, non-government organizations, state universities, and privilege individuals and entities, among others, which is deemed a necessary move to improve the tax treatment of these sectors and the tax system as a whole.
